DOC.brief_summary: Adjuvant Colon Cancer With ELOXatin®/5 FU Based Regimen: ACCELOX
DOC.brief_title: Adjuvant Colon Cancer w/ ELOXatin®/5 FU Based Regimen: ACCELOX
DOC.detailed_description: It's a study of adjuvant colon carcinoma using ELOXatin/5-FU based chemotherapeutic regimen called ACCELOX as a definitive curative therapy.
DOC.criteria: Patients with Adjuvant Colon Cancer Patients with diagnosis other than Colon Cancer.
